en.title: Great News! New Presidential Directors Bonus.
en.content:
FE is pleased to announce a  new bonus as an incentive for all our Presidential Directors, effective immediately. This special bonus of 2% of company’s monthly PV turnover will be shared amongst all Presidential Directors based on number of cycles achieved every quarter of the year.

We would like to thank all our Presidential Directors for their hard work, commitment and continuous support!
